text:
Patrick McKenna is an American entrepreneur and investor based in San Francisco Bay Area. He won "Young Entrepreneur of the Year" award from the chamber of commerce for greater Philadelphia.
Education and career.
Patrick McKenna graduated from University of Southern California in 1992. Patrick also obtained his MBA from McDonough School of Business. In 2009, Patrick founded the HighRidge Global, a private investment and advisory firm.
According to The Vindicator, McKenna worked with a group of 13 entrepreneurs in examining possible investments opportunities in the Youngstown, Ohio at the invitation of U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan of Howland, D-13th.
